details.description: A browser extension for API access and token management in ADP Workforce Manager
details.author: NAS WFM BOOMI

0.1.0.0: Initial UI and functionality for client ID & Access Token
0.1.0.2: ADP WFMgr valid session logic implemented

0.2.0.0: Admin > Clear All Data, Clear Client Data, Export CSV, Export JSON & Import functionality implemented

0.3.0.0: Created functionality to retrieve access and refresh tokens to local storage

0.4.0.0: UI adjustments for token length display
0.4.0.1: Updated UI to include refresh token information
0.4.0.2: UPdated UI and functionality for Copy Token functions

0.6.0.0: UI adjustments for dynamic themes via CSS variables
0.6.0.1: Initial themes and theme functionality implemented
0.6.0.2: Float and Dock buttons and functionality implemented

0.7.0.0: Added collapsible refresh token section to UI
0.7.0.1: Token timers overhaul to handle refreshing the correct time in all scenarios

0.8.0.0: Entire main.js refactor to order items for clarity and remove redundancies
0.8.0.1: Added API Library collapsible section along with initial API Library

0.9.1.0: Corrected client URL generation for NO-SSO

0.9.2.0: Added AdHoc GET and POST request functionality
0.9.2.1: Added View Request button that will show information on most recent session API request
0.9.2.2: Updated 'Copy' buttons to change button text to 'Copied!' instead of  popping up an alert
0.9.2.3: Updated Send Request button to change button text to 'Success!' when successful, instead of popping up an alert
0.9.2.4: Updated Save Client ID button to change button text to 'Client ID Saved!' when successful, instead of popping up an alert
0.9.2.5: Updated Save Client Secret button to change button text to 'Client Secret Saved!' when successful, instead of popping up an alert
0.9.2.6: Added View Client Data to the Admin menu
0.9.2.7: Added Popout Response button to API Response section
0.9.2.8: Changed console.error to console.log for validation items

1.0.0.0: Added functionality for use in incognito mode

1.0.1.0: Fixed bug that prevented links from opening when not in incognito due to functionality added in 1.0.0

1.0.2.0: Updated executeAPI with new helper function to wait for access token to be retrieved if iniating an API call without a current valid token
1.0.2.1: Updated Copy API Response function to not include the Popout Response body text

1.0.3.0: Updated Execute API to show waiting with a visual indicator while waiting for the API to send its response
1.0.3.1: Fixed query parameters not appending to API URL
1.0.3.2: Updated existing API Library names from 'Config' to 'Setup'
1.0.3.3: Added 'Integrations - Installed Integrations' to the API Library
1.0.3.4: Added 'Integrations - Run Results' to the API Library
1.0.3.5: Added 'Integrations - Scheduled Integrations' to the API Library
1.0.3.6: Added 'Reporting - Get Report Data Objects' to the API Library

1.0.3.9: Added 'Setup - Timekeeping Bonus/Deductions' to the API Library

1.0.3.11: Added 'Setup - Timekeeping Combination Rules' to the API Library
1.0.3.12: Added 'Setup - Timekeeping Fixed Rules' to the API Library
1.0.3.13: Added 'Setup - Timekeeping Overtime Rules' to the API Library
1.0.3.14: Added 'Setup - Timekeeping Pay Code Diestributions' to the API Library
1.0.3.15: Fixed bug in Developer Portal link introduced but Incognito mode support

1.1.0.0: Enhanced API Library to allow API that are dependant on the response of another API call
1.1.0.1: Enabled multi-text body parameter limit functionality to assist with staying within service limits
1.1.0.2: Enhanced API Library and response section to support limited export to CSV functionality
